item.title: Week 10 Digital Public Archaeology
item.description: Goals Listen Read Do Reflect Report Back Goals for this week This week is about finding the compelling story, the enchanting story, the heart-centered work of archaeology. Listen Your browser does not support the audio element. Right-click and save-as this link to download the audio file Read Tringham, Ruth. 2020. Closely Observed Layers: Storytelling and the Heart in Kisha Supernant, Jane Eva Baxter, Natasha Lyons, Sonya Atalay (eds). Archaeologies of the Heart, Springer, Cham, 2020.
